name: EveNavigator
0:
”Alexa, ask Eve Navigator to set my destination to the nearest trade hub”
”Set a reminder for when my next industry job finishes”
”What are my recent transactions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eve navigator
des:
Eve Navigator provides you with an interface into Eve Online allowing you to access your character's status and control some in-game functions

Note that the majority of features in this skill require linking to an Eve Online account. This can be done from the Alexa app once the skill has been activated.

Need to go somewhere?
Alexa, ask Eve Navigator to set my destination to Jita

Just need to get to the nearest trade hub?
Alexa, ask Eve Navigator to set my destination to the nearest trade hub

Need a reminder when your next industry job finishes?
Alexa, ask Eve Navigator to set a reminder for when my next industry job finishes

Want to know how much ISK you currently have?
Alexa, ask Eve Navigator for my current ISK
